snippet: Bo Xilai, a former senior Communist Party official who was sentenced to life in prison last month, expects a court in eastern China to make a decision soon on his appeal, a family associate said.
lead_paragraph: Bo Xilai, a former senior Communist Party official who was sentenced to life in prison last month, expects a court in eastern China to make a decision soon on his appeal, a family associate said.

headline.main: China: Decision in Bo Xilai Appeal Expected Soon
headline.print_headline: China: Decision in Bo Xilai Appeal Expected Soon
